Felipe Fronchetti
Felipe Fronchetti
Master's Student in Computer Science
University of São Paulo
fronchetti@usp.br
BIOGRAPHY
Fronchetti is a Master's Degree student in Computer Science at the University of São Paulo (USP), Brazil. His research lies in the intersection between Software Engineering (SE) and Computer Supported Cooperative Work (CSCW). He is co-(author) of 8 papers in top tier journals and conferences on Software Engineering, working on the supporting of newcomers in Open Source Software communities.
EDUCATION
  • M.Sc. in Computer Science
    University of São Paulo (USP) 2018 - Current
  • B.Sc. in Computer Science
    Federal University of Technology - Paraná (UTFPR) 2014 - 2017
